lines.text: [Sanjuro's talking with three men]
You're all tough, then?
What? Kill me if you can!
It'll hurt.
Kill one or a hundred. You only hang once.
I'll get paid for killing, and this town is full of people who deserve to die.
A truce is merely the seed for an even bigger battle, nothing is worse!

[standing in a street that is littered with corpses]
Now we'll have some peace and quiet in this town.
Go hang yourself.
I'm not dying yet. I have to kill quite a few men first.

[referring to Sanjuro]
You don't look like one of the living!
[Sanjuro has just killed two men and cut the arm off a third]
Cooper. Two coffins... No, maybe three.
What happened? Why so glum? Your business should be booming.
No. When the fighting gets this bad, they don't bother with coffins.
Say, samurai trash, are you there?... The entrance to hell - I'll be waiting there for you!
[Unosoke dies]
He died as recklessly as he lived
[Sanjuro walks away]
Now it'll be quiet in this town... So long!

[family he has just saved is crying with gratitude]
Stop. Stop crying. It's pathetic.
[they keep crying]
I hate pathetic people. I'll have to kill you.
[last lines]
Old man. See ya around.
Bitch!
Yeah, what!

[in Japanese]
Look at this mess. I knew this would happen. I told you six men are not enough.
If I don't have my pistol, I feel sort of naked.

[after the gamblers have challenged him]
No help for fools.
[draws sword and kills two of them]
Are you afraid of ghosts?
No they make me feel just great.
[repeated line]
Old man, get me something to eat.
You idiot, I'm not giving up yet. Theres a bunch of guys I have to kill first!
He's nothing without his sword
[first lines]

[in Japanese]
Wait, son.

[in Japanese]
Let me go, father. It's my chance.

[in Japanese]
Everybody's after easy money.

[in Japanese]
You want to hire me as a body guard? Watch. I'll show you my ability.
[in Japanese]
[to Hansuke]
You want to see something interesting?

[in Japanese]
By the way, those six men were cut up pretty well. You're the only one around here good enough to have done something like that.

[in Japanese]
And your point?

[in Japanese]
I'm thinking that you were the one who killed those six men.
[in Japanese]
[to Sanjuro]
That's a shortcut to hell.
[in Japanese]
[to Unosuke]
Hey, you don't know him, but he's one of the best.
[in Japanese]
[to Sanjuro]
Don't come too close.
